about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a Junior Software Engineer with over 2 years of experience in full-stack application development. I'm passionate about creating web solutions that not only work well but also deliver an exceptional user experience.
about.paragraph2: I've built complete projects that integrate secure authentication, relational databases, processing queues, cloud storage, and modern frontends with React. My focus is on developing scalable, well-structured solutions with clean code.
about.paragraph3: I'm currently seeking my first job as a Junior Full-Stack Developer, where I can continue growing professionally and deliver value from day one.
